segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing at the sink, drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, what's happening at the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is running full blast and overflowing the basin!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is forming on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually submerged in the water, yet she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could easily slip and fall on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really worry about an accident happening here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how unaware she is of the immediate danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be extensive if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is quite unsettling to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
